p: Reagentsâ€”Solvents were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich Ltd. (Dorset, UK) of at least HPLC grade and were not purified further. Lipid standards were purchased from Avanti Polar lipids (Alabaster, AL; via Instruchemie, Delfzijl, NL) and used without purification. Consumables were purchased from Sarstedt AG & Co. (Leicester, UK) or Wolf Labs (Wolverhampton, UK).
